message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO 

The paper describes a new spatio-temporal video autoencoder that uses convolutional long short-term memory (LSTM) cells to integrate changes over time and predict optical flow. The proposed framework has applications in weakly-supervised semantic segmentation of videos through label propagation using optical flow. Given these details, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also involves deep learning techniques and optimization, which are common in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper deals with multimedia (cs.MM) and robotics (cs.RO) applications, which are also possible sub-categories.
